name: Average Open Age Days
expression: AVERAGEX(FILTER(Unit_card_transactions, Unit_card_transactions[transaction_sum] >= 0 && Unit_card_transactions[accnr] <> "V999" && Unit_card_transactions[checked_by_region] <> 6 && Unit_card_transactions[moved_to_client] = 0), DATEDIFF(Unit_card_transactions[sale_date], TODAY(), DAY))
